translations: 论文，论述（treatise 的复数形式）；政府论（书名）

sentences.sentence: Now the treatises that Milton wrote on the rights of divorce in the 1640s are also extravagantly pro-marriage.
sentences.translation: 弥尔顿在十七世纪四十年代所写的关于离婚权利的论文也非常支持婚姻。

sentences.sentence: Every conceivable Protestant sect was publishing treatises of theological speculation and religious propaganda at a surprising rate.
sentences.translation: 任何能想到的新教派别都在以惊人的速度出版神学思辨的论文和宗教宣传的论文。

sentences.sentence: Many treatises and form books now come with forms on disk or CD-ROM.
sentences.translation: 许多专著和文体书都有配套的磁盘或是光盘。
